entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cowansville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
